statements: DELETE FROM aid_organizations WHERE org_name = 'Red Cross';
DELETE FROM aid_organizations WHERE org_id = 1001 AND org_name = 'World Aid';
DELETE FROM aid_organizations WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' AND email LIKE '%example.com';
DELETE FROM aid_organizations WHERE org_name = 'Global Relief' AND (phone_number = '123-456-7890' OR email = 'contact@globalrelief.org');
DELETE FROM Organizations WHERE location = 'New York' AND contact_person = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM contact WHERE org_id = 1 AND contact_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM aid_data WHERE org_id = 2 AND location = 'City A';
DELETE FROM aid_project WHERE project_id IN (SELECT project_id FROM aid_organization WHERE org_type = 'Funding');
DELETE FROM project_member WHERE project_id = (SELECT project_id FROM aid_project WHERE project_name = 'Education Project');
